channel.title: TV on Favorite Quotes
channel.description: Recent content in TV on Favorite Quotes

item.title: Apathy Kills
Never Half-Ass Two Things
item.description: Never half-ass two things. Whole-ass one thing. – Ron Swanson (“Parks and Recreation”)

item.title: Push A Man To Violence
item.description: It’d be a mistake to push a man to violence if violence is what he has dedicated his life to perfecting. “The Terminal List” (Season 1, Episode 6)

item.title: Staging a Revolution
item.description: Casey: What is going on here? Big Mike: Store’s being bought. They’re canning everybody except Bartowski and Grimes. Jeff: We’re staging a revolution to take down the man. Casey: I want in. Lester: How do we know that we can trust you, son? That you’re not some kind of spy for the man? Casey: Because the only thing I hate more than hippie neo-liberal fascists and anarchistsâ€¦ are the hypocrite fat-cat suits they eventually grow up to become.

item.title: The Face of a Coward
item.description: What is the face of a coward? The back of his head as he runs from battle. – Frank Underwood (“House of Cards”, Season 3, Episode 3)

item.title: Tosh.0 on America
item.description: We may catch a lot of flak from other countries. But when you’ve been kicking ass and taking names since 1776, hater’s gonna hate. – Daniel Tosh (“Tosh.0”, 01-Feb-2011)

item.title: Two Kinds Of People On Planet Earth
item.description: There are two kinds of people on planet earth who do not have beards, women and children. I am neither. – Phil Robertson (source)
